ing: 1 English cucumber, peeled and cut into bite-size pieces
n: Vegan Tomato, Cucumber, and Lentil Salad
des: "This is one of my favorite fresh summer salads. The lentils add a nice smoky flavor to the spicy onion, basil, and sweet balsamic vinegar. This is delicious served hot or cold and is a very satisfying vegan main dish."
ins:
Combine water and lentils in a large pot. Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer gently until lentils are tender but not mushy, about 20 minutes. Drain excess liquid and transfer to a large bowl.
Stir cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, and basil into lentils. Dress with balsamic vinegar.
